events.comment: at the beginning initialize the player and the chaser properties
setup collision between the player and the wall
create a view object in position of the chaser every x second and move it toward the player
if chaser view is in collision with player, alert the chaser and store the player location inside object variables
if chaser view is at view_distance from chaser, delete view_object so the chaser can not see further
if the view is in collision with the view_obstacle group, delete the view
if chaser is alerted, move it toward the target location which is always tha last known location of the player and change animation to chase
if chaser is alerted but doesn't move, it means it can no linger see the player and set alerted to 0
if the chaser is not alerted, set the animation to idle and move the chaser around in a small radious
